description:
Tsuna wonders whether to accept Spanners help to complete his X Burner. Giannini opposes the idea over the transmitter. He says that they cannot trust an enemy engineer. Meanwhile, Gamma is cornered by Gokudera`s attacks that use five different waves. Gamma takes cover and carefully takes out a box from his pocket. It is a box that Yuni, boss of the Black Spells, asked the Phantom Knight to give to Gamma. Gokudera tries to drive Gamma out and defeat him. But a box weapon shaped like a black fox surrounded in large Lightning flames appears above Gokudera--!
Source: crunchyroll
